title: The Hookup Plan
description: He’s my brother’s best friend and I have a plan to seduce him that will blow his mind...Jefferson Evian has been my brother’s best friend since we were kids. He’s hot, funny, and totally out of my reach. Some might even say he’s forbidden to me. All because of my overprotective and bossy older brother.I’ve tried flirting with Jeff on and off throughout the years, but he’s always remained elusive. Until now. Now I’m ready to make him mine. I don’t care if my brother won’t let me date him or if my best friend can’t stand him.I have a plan that should help me win Jeff’s heart once and for all and it all starts with a sexy hookup.Another Standalone book in the Dating Plan world.
author: J.S. Cooper
